remarks: If a set of vectors is included in a closed set, so is its closure. (Contributed by NM, 17-Jun-2015.)
statement:
dochsscl.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dochsscl.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dochsscl.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.
dochsscl.i $e |- I = ( ( DIsoH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dochsscl.o $e |- ._|_ = ( ( ocH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dochsscl.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
dochsscl.x $e |- ( ph -> X C_ V ) $.
dochsscl.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. ran I ) $.
dochsscl $p |- ( ph -> ( X C_ Y <-> ( ._|_ ` ( ._|_ ` X ) ) C_ Y ) ) $.
